column2: SELECT G.ObjID -- we want the photometric ObjID FROM Galaxy as G, -- G is the galaxy SpecObj as S, -- S is the spectra of galaxy G SpecLine as L, -- L is a line of S SpecLineNames as LN -- the names of the lines WHERE G.ObjID = S.bestObjID -- connect the galaxy to the spectrum and S.SpecObjID = L.SpecObjID -- and the spectral line L is detected in the spectrum and L.LineId = LN.value -- L is the H alpha line and LN.name = # and L.ew > # -- and H alpha is at least # angstroms wide.
